fields.summary: HTTP connection pool for async requests

status.description: This issue is undergoing QA.  See linked QA issue(s) for progress.
status.name: In QA

issuetype.description: A user story. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.

status.description: This issue is undergoing QA.  See linked QA issue(s) for progress.
status.name: In QA

fields.description:
Tested on cloud in EDGE mode with UFS running as a separate component on a host with ~8G memory.

System:
http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/356/

I noticed that both the CLC and UFS hosts were swapping heavily and I saw warnings on CLC indicating the cloud's inability to allocate memory.

{code}

              total        used        free      shared  buff/cache   available
Mem:           6.9G        6.5G        135M        8.9M        253M         88M
Swap:          7.1G        3.1G        4.0G

On CLC:

[root@d-15 ~]# euserv-describe-services
SERVICE  autoscaling          API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.autoscaling     notready  
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend   eucalyptus        10.111.5.139                     enabled   
SERVICE  bootstrap            bootstrap         10.111.5.139                     enabled   
SERVICE  cassandra            eucalyptus        10.111.5.139                     broken    
SERVICE  cloudformation       API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.cloudformation  notready  
SERVICE  cloudwatch           API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.cloudwatch      notready  
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend    eucalyptus        10.111.5.139                     enabled   
SERVICE  cluster              one               one-cc-0                         enabled   
SERVICE  cluster              two               two-cc-0                         enabled   
SERVICE  compute              API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.compute         notready  
SERVICE  dns                  API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.dns             notready  
SERVICE  ec2reports           API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.ec2reports      notready  
SERVICE  euare                API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.euare           notready  
SERVICE  eucalyptus           eucalyptus        10.111.5.139                     enabled   
SERVICE  identity             API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.identity        notready  
SERVICE  imaging              API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.imaging         notready  
SERVICE  imagingbackend       eucalyptus        10.111.5.139                     enabled   
SERVICE  loadbalancing        API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.loadbalancing   notready  
SERVICE  notifications        eucalyptus        10.111.5.139                     enabled   
SERVICE  objectstorage        API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.objectstorage   notready  
SERVICE  pollednotifications  eucalyptus        10.111.5.139                     enabled   
SERVICE  portal               API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.portal          notready  
SERVICE  simplequeue          API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.simplequeue     notready  
SERVICE  simpleworkflow       API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.simpleworkflow  notready  
SERVICE  storage              one               one-sc-0                         enabled   
SERVICE  storage              two               two-sc-0                         notready  
SERVICE  tag                  API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.tag             notready  
SERVICE  tokens               API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166.tokens          notready  
SERVICE  user-api             API_10.111.5.166  API_10.111.5.166                 notready  
SERVICE  walrusbackend        walrus            walrus-0                         notready 
{code}

{code}


2017-04-04 16:19:20  WARN | An exception was thrown by a user handler's exceptionCaught() method while handling the following exception:
io.netty.util.internal.OutOfDirectMemoryError: failed to allocate 1024 byte(s) of direct memory (used: 8589934356, max: 8589934592)
        at io.netty.util.internal.PlatformDependent.incrementMemoryCounter(PlatformDependent.java:506)
        at io.netty.util.internal.PlatformDependent.allocateDirectNoCleaner(PlatformDependent.java:460)

io.netty.util.internal.OutOfDirectMemoryError: failed to allocate 1024 byte(s) of direct memory (used: 8589934356, max: 8589934592)
        at io.netty.util.internal.PlatformDependent.incrementMemoryCounter(PlatformDependent.java:506)

fields.summary: Cloud running out of memory under normal use

comments.body: Fixed by releasing resources for inbound http response message with async requests.
